meanings.definition: Highest in position, rank, or importance.
meanings.sent1: The uppermost shelf held the most valuable books.
meanings.sent2: The uppermost floor of the building offered a stunning view of the city.
meanings.sent3: The uppermost seat at the table was reserved for the guest of honor.
meanings.sent4: Her uppermost priority was to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent5: The uppermost star in the sky shone brightly on the clear night.

meanings.definition: Situated at the top or highest point.
meanings.sent1: The uppermost branch of the tree swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The uppermost button on the shirt was missing.
meanings.sent3: The uppermost bunk in the dorm room was the most sought after.
meanings.sent4: The uppermost peak of the mountain was covered in snow.
meanings.sent5: The uppermost cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy pillow.

meanings.sent1: Her uppermost feature was her bright smile.
meanings.sent2: The uppermost color in the painting caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The uppermost flower in the garden bloomed first.
meanings.sent4: His uppermost talent was his ability to play the piano.
meanings.sent5: The uppermost sound in the room was the ticking of the clock.
